department: Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)
short_summary: The National Research Council’s (NRC) Energy, Mining and Environment (EME) Vancouver branch has a requirement for one Vibratory Polisher Machine for preparing samples for Electron Backscatter Diffraction (EBSD) characterization.
